news.title: Three children arrested on suspicion of murder of man in Kent
news.summary: A 16-year-old girl and two boys, aged 14 and 15, are in police custody after an incident on Sunday.

news.title: Over-70s face driving ban for failing eye tests
news.summary: The proposed changes in England and Wales come after a coroner calls the UK's licensing system the "laxest in Europe".

news.title: Lucy Letby's new expert supporters claim no babies were deliberately harmed. Who should we believe?
news.summary: Barrister Mark McDonald claims he has the backing of a panel of world class experts who say there is no evidence any babies were deliberately harmed. Who should we believe?

news.title: FA Cup winners Crystal Palace lose appeal against demotion from Europa League
news.summary: Crystal Palace are unsuccessful in their appeal against being demoted from the Europa League and will play in the Conference League this season.

news.title: Amber health alerts as heatwave temperatures set to hit 34C
news.summary: Temperatures are expected to peak on Tuesday as heat health alerts are issued for the whole of England.

news.title: UK's biggest toy shop chain The Entertainer handed to staff
news.summary: The toy retailer's 1,900 workers will get a share of profits and a say in how the business is run.

news.title: Record warm seas help to bring extraordinary new species to UK waters
news.summary: The UK's seas have had their warmest first seven months of the year on average since records began.

news.title: British man who perished in Antarctic glacier found 65 years later
news.summary: His brother tells BBC News that he had lost hope he would ever be found.

news.title: EasyJet pilot suspended after being seen 'drunk and naked'
news.summary: The budget airline grounded the unnamed pilot after hotel guests reportedly complained after the incident in Cape Verde.

news.title: Their loved ones are missing at war. So these Ukrainian children spend summer together
news.summary: Will Vernon gets exclusive access to a pioneering summer camp for Ukrainian children with missing parents.
